name: Skeleton Warrior
languages: all the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The skeleton warrior has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The skeleton warrior's weapon attacks are magical and have a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton warrior makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.
